tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is swapna I had pleasure of being under the care of Dr swathi gogineni I have infertility problem iam unable to conceive up to 3yrs after my marriage I took treatment to get pregnant Dr swathi is very expert to treat infertile couple her care and treatment was exlent and appropriate as for as patient need .she is very punctual and timely taken care throught my antinatal and post natal as well as infertility care Dr swathi is good for obstric and gynic and infertily.and nursing care is so good and all team is exllent I thank you to Dr swathi and all team of credle staff .I strongly recommend Dr swathi for apollo hospitals

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to Swathi mam when I was 6th month pregnant with severe headache can't even stand...I appreciate mam as she did her duty as a doctor first she gave me treatment and told me exactly what happened asking me all my symptoms and my present condition... Before coming to Swathi mam I went two other doctors who didn't even ask me about my suffering, instead they asked whether I'm there regular visit patient or not..
I had BP from then n slowly my BP was going on..Mam with patience treated me every month she gave me tablets n diet till my delivery and gave birth to a boy who is 3yrs old now.. Thankyou for your support and the way you treat us in a positive way.. Always remember till my last breathe..God bless you n your family..
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Usha. Take care....

review: Doctor not friendly, and clinic front office staff help less, they don't have patience, very bad experience
Not given proper medicine, health issues are not cleared.  Doctor was not friendly. PCOD Medicine was not given and no pain killer tablet was given.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Consulted for Pregnancy confirmation and there on frequent monthly checkups

Initially we consulted Swathi mam for Pregnancy confirmation and for counselling regarding covid situations. She listened patiently about our questions and clearly explained that there is no need to worry due to covid(About Vaccination/Hospitalization/Baby Health....)

After speaking to her we are clear that COVID is not a constraint for continuing with pregnancy. There on we continued for monthly checkups and also when required. In every consultation she explained about reports of both mother and baby health.

Unfortunately we need to plan our delivery in my hometown but not in Hyderabad, so we moved to our hometown after 8th month consultation. In last consultation also she guided what needs to be done for remaining months.

Last week we blessed with Baby Boy, both mother and child are doing good.

Thank You Mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Swathi G is one of those doctors who is Meticulous in her approach and to the point and systematic in her explanation. My wife (manasa) being a pre diabetic was completely under her care for the entire 9 months period! She was hands on in helping us through the progress along with being our Wikipedia in answering all the questions! 
She observed all the minute details and carefully guided us through out the entire scans and explained all observations without missing a bit and translating the doctors terminology in simple language!  Dr. Swathi is very straightforward in her approach without any unwanted pampering.
Gynecologist world needs more doctors like her! Thanks Dr. Swathi!
reply_text: Thank you Manasa for your kind words. Feel very happy for you and your family. You and your husband were very understanding right from the beginning. Take care and be safe.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted Swathi mam for my second pregnancy and gave birth to a baby girl. I strongly recommend her for her professionalism, care , explanation during the visit and she gives enough time to listen to us. She is very friendly and explains each and everything clearly with lot of patience(if she feels we didnt get the complete information she will repeat everything again ). During this pregnancy I had few issues, But she made me strong spreading the positivity. whenever I met her I feel so confident and comfortable because she will make sure i understand the issue and follow her suggestions. Thanks a lot Mam for everything..
reply_text:
Thank you so much. Take care. 
Regards....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All went well in the first appointment. She objectively explained the reasons for my issue. Friendly doctor
reply_text: Thank you very much. Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor was friendly and explains everything about the situation. Listens well and asks all details for proper analysis which is very good.
The instructions were clear and understandable! Being new to the city, I found it very secured while talking with her.
reply_text: Thank you Divya and please take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review: She needs to show more patience. Listen to patient carefully. ******* **** ** ** ******** ***** *********** **** ******* *** *** ********* ******** ** **** ******* This feedback is based on just one time visit for consultation. We are not yet sure about her skills. She could be good at them. Consider this feedback as positive. Thanks
reply_text: The condition was very clearly explained to the patient.In this covid situation , we are trying to minimise the crowd inside the clinic and in the consultation room. Hence we are not allowing attendants inside our room unless in case of emergency. I think it would be better if the attendants understand this. Inspite of repeated attempts if the attendants donâ€™t listen , then I think we would have to be stricter because it is not just for our safety but also yours. Thank you ....

review: She is not in friendly nature, she won't explain problem properly. When we asked second time she won't reply

review: ****** * *** **** **** ******* **** ****** **** positive attitude and she explains patiently about the health issue. I recommend her for any Gynic related issues. Cleared all the queries
Doctor clearly explained the situation and procedure. Gave helpful options to resolve the medical condition.
